thread.title: Wayne Newton spotted at the Democratic debate
thread.title_full: Wayne Newton spotted at the Democratic debate

title: Wayne Newton spotted at the Democratic debate
text:
Posted: 12:02 a.m. Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 Wayne Newton spotted at the Democratic debate ﻿ “Mr. Las Vegas” Wayne Newton t.. More News Headlines 
For a debate held in Las Vegas, he’s an appropriate attendee. 
Wayne Newton, Mr. Las Vegas, was spotted in the audience for the first Democratic debate . 
Presidential candidate Jim Webb’s Twitter account tweeted a photo of Newton, saying, “Just minutes before the debate, spotted in the house: Mr. Las Vegas.” Just minutes before the debate, spotted in the house: Mr. Las Vegas @WayneNewtonMrLV . #DemDebate pic.twitter.com/eTjhVtemno — Jim Webb (@JimWebbUSA) October 14, 2015 
Newton also could be spotted in the audience in several TV shots. Is that Wayne Newton at #DemDebate ? He's performed at @realDonaldTrump 's Mar-a-Lago pic.twitter.com/Yqe9Hs9Axe — George Bennett (@gbennettpost) October 14, 2015 
Mr. Las Vegas is no stranger to politics. He chatted with CNN before the debate.
